data.title: Anna Lee
data.text:
AKA Joan Boniface Winnifrith

Born: 2-Jan-1913

Birthplace: Igtham, Kent, England

Died: 14-May-2004

Location of death: Beverly Hills, CA

Cause of death: Pneumonia

Remains: Buried, Westwood Memorial Park, Los Angeles, CA

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Lila Quartermaine on General Hospital

Husband: Robert Stevenson (film director, m. 1933, div. 1944)

Daughter: Venetia Stevenson (b. 10-Mar-1938, m. Don Everly)

Husband: George Stafford (m. 1945, div. 1964)

Son: Jeffrey Byron (age 48 at time of her death)

Husband: Robert Nathan (m. 1970, d. 1985)

Sister: Ruth

University: Central School of Speech Training and Dramatic Art

Member of the British Empire 1982

Daytime Emmy 2004, Lifetime Achievement

Hollywood Walk of Fame Jan-1993

TELEVISION

General Hospital Lila Quartermaine (1978-2004)
